alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 6:21PM EST until March 08 at 4:36AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Ohio, including the following county, Stark. * WHEN...Until 615 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 620 PM EST, The river gauge at the West Branch Nimishillen Creek - Canton was 12.14 feet which is just above moderate flood stage of 12 feet. Area river gauges remain elevated this afternoon and flooding remains possible through this evening and overnight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Canton, North Canton and Meyers Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
